name: Godot Jam Dungeon Run
description:
Dungeon Run

A two button dungeon crawler thing made with Godot!

Battle the dangerous pink slime to get gold to buy new weapons and armor!

Get your combo up by hitting the correct keys and picking up the combo bonus during the run stage.

Controls:

Two buttons:

[A] = Go left

[D] = Go right

[A] + [D] = Jump (during run stage), Block (during fight stage)

Source code: My Github Link

Art assets made by Kenney
